posts.post_title: SOLD!!!T206 Christy Mathewson Dark Cap SGC Auth $250 OBO
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Brian Koyama
I purchased this card raw from the boards and have recently upgraded.  The original seller stated the card might be trimmed, but guaranteed it's authenticity.
It's a sweet looking card, unfortunately it's a wee bit short width wise.
My ebay id is: neenish (have a perfect 100% rating with over 890+ positive feedbacks).
$250.00 OBO shipped to the US via USPS Priority mail w/insurance and delivery confirmation. (The scanner is dirty)
Am I asking too much for this card?
The mark on the front is a scratch on the slab, no creases are on the card.
Questions: bghkoyama at yahoo dot com
